cards.title: Broken machine secure channel, blocking domain authentication.
cards.explanation: This card indicates 'Broken machine secure channel, blocking domain authentication.'. Investigate configuration, service state, permissions, and recent changes impacting this area.

steps: Use Evidence to target failing component; review services, logs, and policies.
